data.title: TZL - Introduction | Company Overview
data.meta_description: TZL - Introduction | Company Overview - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. Slide | 1

2. Slide | 2 Comprehensive patent portfolio – Over 180 patent applications Over US$40 million invested to establish SMA actuator capability and Smart Device end-to-end hardware and software infrastructure World leader in intelligent locking and fastening technology About TZ Australian publicly listed technology company with offices in Sydney, Brisbane, Singapore and Chicago ASX : TZL Strong, retained and recurring business with large blue chip corporate client base Dedicated and high performing in-house development team – Hardware, Electronics and Software Development

3. Slide | 3 State-of-the-Art Smart Locking  NASA Tech Brief – Product of the Year 2005.  Digital Locking Device with embedded microchip  Integrated sensing and switching – IOT functionality  Only SMA actuated locking device in the world … Lighter, Smaller, Smarter Nickel Titanium Shape Memory Alloy (SMA)

4. Slide | 4 SMA Actuation Processing Power Integrated Sensing to enable alternative compact form factors to suit a range of applications to enable connection to networks and large databases to enable processing power and programmable logic control to detect changes in the physical environment Addressability TZ Smart Device Features Locking Mechanism to provide the primary locking or fastening function Control Software to enable remote control via software

5. Slide | 5 TZ Design Capability  Dedicated in–house development capability  Full service consultancy Industrial Design | Mechanical Engineering | Manufacturing Management  Team of dedicated passionate and creative professionals with diverse backgrounds  End-to-end product design and development  Over 1000 successfully completed projects for external clients  20 International Design and Innovation Awards  Extensive support network of manufacturing suppliers

6. Slide | 6 TZ Software Capability  Dedicated and high performing in- house Software Development Team of 30 people based and operating from Sydney Head Office  Team experience covers SOA, web and client-server applications development based on standard Microsoft technologies  Dedicated mobile app development team for iOS and Android platforms  Extensive experience in integrating with third party systems … real-time and batch implementations  Strong business analysis and software customization capability  Experienced Hardware – Software Device integration capability

7. Slide | 7  Solutions that integrate physical security and environmental monitoring right down to the asset level — the cabinet or server level  A more holistic approach to remote data center security, protection and control. Leader in Data Centre Security

8. Slide | 8 Extensive Customer Base City of New York

9. Slide | 9 Smart Locker Solutions for ...  Corporate Accountable Mail  Corporate Day Storage  Residential Concierge  University Housing  Retail Click and Collect  Postal and Logistics Leader in Smart Locker Solutions

10. Slide | 10 Leader in Smart Locker Solutions Accountable Mail Lockers

11. Slide | 11 Extensive Customer Base Accountable Mail Lockers

12. Slide | 12 Leader in Smart Locker Solutions Day Lockers

13. Slide | 13 Extensive Customer Base Day Lockers

14. Slide | 14 Leader in Smart Locker Solutions Postal and Logistics
